lines.text: The only way to resign from our profession is to die.
A spy in love is a tool that has outlived its usefulness.
Shiva, I dance for you tonight, as the bailars dance in the sacred temples in Java.
What people you Russians are. What charming savages.
Gay? With DiSignac? Is that necessary?
I love you as one adores sacred things.
Courage. Courage, my dear. Be brave.

[taunting General Shubin over Mata Hari's assignation with Rosanoff]
We older men merely furnish the soft lights and champagne... the mood, as it were. Youth whistles, and we... we spend the rest of the evening reading a book.
